cancelStream(uint256).details: Cancel a stream and refund remaining funds

params.streamId: ID of the stream to cancel

claimRewards().details: Claim accumulated rewards (SUSTAINABLE: based on actual fee revenue)

createStream(address,uint256).details: Create a new money stream with sustainable fee split

params.duration: Duration of the stream in seconds

distributeExcessFunds().details: Distribute excess funds: 50% owner, 30% charity, 20% staker bonus

getBalanceInfo().details: Get contract's current balance and total liabilities

getClaimableBalance(uint256).details: Get the claimable balance for a stream

getClaimableRewards(address).details: Get claimable rewards for a user (per hour calculation)

getCurrentAPY().details: Calculate current APY based on actual fee revenue

returns._0: Fee basis points, total fees collected, owner revenue available, charity funds available

getRealisticClaimableRewards(address).details: Get REALISTIC claimable rewards (capped by available funds)

returns._0: Staker share BPS, owner share BPS
Total staked, total rewards available, reward rate

isSolvent().details: Check if contract has enough balance to cover all staked funds

returns._0: true if contract is solvent, false if undercollateralized

updateRewardRate(uint256).details: Update reward rate (per hour basis points)

params.newRate: New reward rate in basis points per hour

params.streamId: ID of the stream to withdraw from
